stories.text:
We worked on this tool that helps us generate crud endpoints for the models we define as well as start our project with things like auth, auto-generated docs, pre-commit hooks, and docker already set up.

Check it out: https://dev.to/nyior/dr-cli-a-flexible-cookie-cutter-and-crud-endpoints-generator-for-django-2nlb

We'd like to hear your thoughts on this xD
stories.title: Show HN: A CRUD Endpoints Generator and Flexible Cookiecutter for Django

stories.text: From Google search results returning weird Russian porn, to everything being hacked constantly, crypto tanking when this is the exact environment it was supposed to thrive in, to weird online group thought being pushed by bot accounts, wtf is going on?
stories.title: Is the Internet OK?

stories.text:
Hey there HN! We're a pair of devs looking to get feedback for our open-source project.

We're remote engineers who have contracted for many clients overseas. There's a problem that all codebases share: Onboarding devs to a new codebase is hard no matter what.

We're also open-source engineers and learned about the techniques used in OSS to tackle the problem. Please give us your feedback.

Homepage: https://watermelon.tools/

Repo: https://github.com/watermelontools/wm-extension

Install: https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=Watermel...
stories.title: Show HN: Watermelon â€“ open-source VSC ext. to document code and view Git blame
